name: Birdlist
start_url: The URL that should be loaded when your application is opened

screenshots.description: A screenshot of the start screen

shortcuts.name: The name you would like to be displayed for your shortcut
shortcuts.url: The url you would like to open when the user chooses this shortcut. This must be a URL local to your PWA. For example: If my start_url is /, this URL must be something like /shortcut
shortcuts.description: A description of the functionality of this shortcut
